name: Candy Sweet: A Match-3 Game
description:
Candy Sweet is a very addictive match-three game!
Match three or more same candies to make them boom!
Reach the target score to move to the next level.
Four same candies together produce bomb!
Two groups of same candies cross will generate lightning!!
Five same candies together will generate special candy!!!

Features:
- Time Mode: 200 level, there is no time to waste!
- Easy to play but hard to master.
- Game Center
Free download!
